        private void drawNote(double xOffset,
                      double yOffset,
                      int fret,
                      long duration)
        Draws a note onto anchorPane
        Parameters:
        xOffset - The positioning (in pixels) the note will be drawn
        yOffset - The positioning (in pixels) the note will be drawn
        fret - The guitar fret that the note is going to be played
        duration - How long the note will be held for

      • noteColor

      • onPlayClicked

        public void onPlayClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Changes the state of the playback engine. If the engine is playing then it will stop and update all variables. If it is not playing it will start the playback.
        Parameters:
        e -
